resources.string: Hello! Welcome to LinuxSAndroid.\n (aka Linux Subsystem for android)\n To add a new chroot environment, select one of the distribution below.
We need to have root access to create chroot environment.\n (or spawn task using root.)
We need to have termux(app) and busybox environment in order to make chroot environment.
Choose one of the distribution below.\n Currently only supports Ubuntu(so why choose)
Ubuntu is a user-friendly linux distro.
